thread.title: INSIGHT: Divers unearth world's biggest underwater cave

title: INSIGHT: Divers unearth world's biggest underwater cave
text:
INSIGHT: Divers unearth world's biggest underwater cave 2:47am EST - 00:40 
A group of divers in eastern Mexico have discovered what is believed to be the largest flooded cave on the planet. The divers connected two giant underwater caverns to make the find.   
A group of divers in eastern Mexico have discovered what is believed to be the largest flooded cave on the planet. The divers connected two giant underwater caverns to make the find.  //reut.rs/2Difg7P
